title: The Brigsby Movie I Made with My Friends
description: It’s a time of reckoning for Brigsby’s home galaxy. The Drumbas have vanished in a great cataclysm and the Sortis crystal is lost. The conclusion to the Brigsby Bear saga.
altHero: Brigsby Bear in the desert raising his arms to the sky
alt1: a Stardust Bandit with helmet and sceptor
alt2: man with futuristic cloak and disco ball helmet gives Brigsby a thumbs up
alt3: Sunsnatcher looks into a building whose roof he collapsed
alt4: a wizard with cloak and staff
